alert.note: Alert for Grainger; Hamblen; Jefferson; Knox; Sevier; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 10:46PM CST until December 09 at 11:30PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Knox County in east Tennessee... Jefferson County in east Tennessee... North central Sevier County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Union County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Grainger County in east Tennessee... West central Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 1230 AM EST. * At 1146 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Knoxville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Morristown, Sevierville, Jefferson City, Dandridge, Rutledge, Plainview, New Market, Strawberry Plains, and Halls. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 386 and 425. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 108 and 109. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 2. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Grainger; Hamblen; Jefferson; Knox; Sevier; Union
